column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ nda pii n'ekyir no
column3: wɔ aber a EWURADZE maa Israel ahomgye wɔ hɔn atamfo a woetwa hɔn ho ehyia nyinara nsamu no
column4: nna Josua ayɛ akɔdaa na oedzi mfe pii."
nye hɔn atsɛmbuafo nye hɔn ahwɛdofo
column6: Mayɛ akɔdaa na medzi mfe pii:"

column2: "na hom ehu dza osian hom ntsi EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn dze ayɛ amanaman yi nyinara; na EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn no

column3: medze tontotwe akyɛ amanaman a wɔaka yi mu ama hom
column4: dɛ ɔnyɛ egyapadze mma hom ebusuakuw ebusuakuw
column6: nye amanaman a metwitwa hɔn egu nyinara
column7: mekyerɛ ɔdze kodu po kɛse no ho ɔdze kɔ witɔree no."

column3: no na obosunsun hɔn efi hom enyim
column4: na oetu hɔn efi hom enyi do; na hom afa hɔn asaase dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn kaa kyerɛɛ hom no."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi hom nnya akokodur papaara dɛ wɔbɔhwɛ na wɔayɛ dza wɔakyerɛw no wɔ Moses mbra nwoma no mu nyinara
column3: dɛ hom nnkɛdan efi ho akɔ enyimfa anaa abankum;"

column2: "dɛ hom nnkɔkɔ amanaman yi a wɔakeka hom mu yi mu. Nkyii so mma hom mmbɔ hɔn enyame dzin
column3: na mma hom mmfa hɔn nndzi nsew so
column4: nkyii so mma hom nnsom hɔn
column5: na hom mmbobɔ hom mu adze mma hɔn so:"

column2: "mbom hom ntakyer EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn ho
column3: dɛ mbrɛ hom ayɛ dze ebodu ndɛ da yi."

column2: "Na EWURADZE etu amanaman akɛse a wɔyɛ dzen efi hom enyim: na hom dze
column3: nyimpa bi nngyinaa hom enyim dze ebodu ndɛ da yi."

column2: "Hom mu nyimpa baako betsiw apem: na EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn no
column4: dɛ mbrɛ ɔkaa kyerɛɛ hom no."

column3: dɛ hom bɔdɔ EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn."

column2: "Ɔno dze sɛ hom nam ɔkwan biara do san ekyir
column3: na hom dze homho kɛbata amanaman nkaa yi ho
column4: mekyerɛ hɔn a wɔakeka hom mu yi ho
column5: na hom nye hɔn dzi awarwar
column7: na hɔn so ba hom nkyɛn a:"

column2: "ɔnodze hom nhu ara ampa dɛ EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn rennda ho nntu amanaman yi mmfi hom enyi do; mbom wɔbɛyɛ efir ama hom
column4: na nsoɛ wɔ hom enyiwa mu
column5: ekodu dɛ hom bɛsɛɛ efi asaase pa yi a EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn dze ama hom yi do."

column4: ndɛ da yi morokɔ adasa nyinara kwan no bi: na hom nyim wɔ hom akoma nyinara mu nye hom akra nyinara mu dɛ asɛm kor nntɔɔ famu wɔ nsɛm pa a EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn kae wɔ hom ho no nyinara mu; ne nyinara aba mu ama hom
column5: no mu asɛm kor mpo anntɔ famu."

column3: dɛ mbrɛ nsɛm papa nyinara a EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn kaa kyerɛɛ hom no aba hom do no
column4: dɛmara so na EWURADZE dze nsɛm bɔn nyinara bɛba hom do
column5: ekodu dɛ ɔbɛsɛɛ hom efi asaase pa yi a EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn dze ama hom yi do."

column2: "Sɛ hom to EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn ahyɛmu a ɔdze hyɛɛ hom no
column3: na hom kɔ kɔsom enyame fofor na hom bɔ hom mu adze ma hɔn a; ɔno EWURADZE n'ebufuw bɛdzɛw hom do
column4: na ɔasɛɛ hom ntsɛm efi asaase pa no a ɔdze ama hom no do."
